managementsystem

Class Loan

  • java.lang.Object
    • managementsystem.Loan
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Loan
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Loan class, contains all informations about a loan. A HashMap contains the equipment borrowed as values and the models matching the values as keys. It also contains the period corresponding to the loan, the borrower and a boolean value in relation to the return of the loan. A Loan is constructed with an Ask class instance. The period and borrower fields are copied and the Loan's HashMap field is filled with the same key set as the Ask's one but the values are the corresponding equipments. Should be a super class for Ask and Loan. initial code by : Marc Karassev; modified by : Marc Karassev, Anthony Saraïs
    Author:
    Marc Karassev, Anthony Saraïs
    See Also:
